titleStmt.title: Meditations and prayers to be used before, at, and after the receiving of the holy sacrament of the Lord's Supper.
titleStmt.author: Northumberland, Elizabeth Percy, Countess of, 1623-1690.

notesStmt.note: Supposed author, Elizabeth Percy, Countess of Northumberland--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
